paper_abstract: In this work we introduce a method, by using the least-squares method and a Schauder basis, which provides a numerical solution for a wide class of linear differential or integral equations. In addition, we give a convergence result and an application. (c) 2007 Published by Elsevier B.V. on behalf of IMACS.
paper_title: A convergence result for a least-squares method using Schauder bases
